title: Don't wait! This spacious 3 bed, 2 bath will go fast! 1425 Sq Ft!
posting_body: ['Location:', '100 Walden Brook Drive - Lithonia, GA 30038', 'Rental Information:', '$1994/Month | 3 Bedroom 2 Bath | 1425 - 1532 sq ft', 'Lease Terms:', '6-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'More Information:', 'show contact info', 'What you’ll find in our community!', '❖ BBQ/Picnic Area', '❖ Conference Room', '❖ Courtyard', '❖ Fitness Center', '❖ Gameroom', '❖ Maintenance on site', '❖ Multi Use Room', '❖ Playground', '❖ Resort Style Swimming Pool w/Cabana', '❖ Sprinkler System', '❖ Car Care Center', '❖ Controlled Access', '❖ Detached garages', '❖ Lake view', '❖ Online Services', '❖ Planned Social Activities', '❖ Property Manager on Site', '❖ Public Transportation', '❖ Sundeck', '❖ Wi-Fi at Pool and Clubhouse', 'Features in this apartment home!', '❖ All electric', '❖ Ceiling Fans', '❖ Dining Room', '❖ Disposal', '❖ Extra Storage', '❖ Pantry', '❖ Patio or Balcony', '❖ Range', '❖ Sprinkler System', '❖ Trash Compactor', '❖ Broadband access', "❖ Children's activity center", '❖ Contemporary floor plans', '❖ Crown Molding', '❖ Fully equipped modern kitchens', '❖ Recreation Room', '❖ Spacious 1, 2 & 3 Bedrooms', '❖ Storage Space', '❖ Views', '❖ Walk-In Closets', 'Call Walden Brook at', 'show contact info', "With a variety of floor plans to choose from, we're certain there's one that's just right for you.", 'Browse our one, two, and three bedroom floor plans.', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Pet Policy:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'Management:', 'Ventron Management', '*Price is subject to change without prior notice', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '2FF46CF1E7DD47']
